-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | An infinite stream of random data
--   
--   Portable interface for the operating system source of pseudo random
--   data. Supported sources are Unix <i>dev</i>urandom, Win32
--   CryptGenRandom and OpenSSL pseudo random numbers generator. This
--   package is based on idea from os.urandom implementation, in CPython.
@package random-stream
@version 0.1.1

module System.Random.URandom
urandom :: Int -> IO ByteString


-- | Pure interface to the system pseudo random number generator. The
--   generator is assumed to provide an infinite stream of random data, and
--   to be implicitly defined.
module System.Random.Stream
newtype Stream
Stream :: ByteString -> Stream
mkStream :: Stream
instance RandomGen Stream
